[最下面的城镇居民净资产数据靠谱吗](https://m.baidu.com/?from=1001192y#iact=wiseindex%2Ftabs%2Fnews%2Factivity%2Fnewsdetail%3D%257B%2522linkData%2522%253A%257B%2522name%2522%253A%2522iframe%252Fmib-iframe%2522%252C%2522id%2522%253A%2522feed%2522%252C%2522index%2522%253A0%252C%2522url%2522%253A%2522https%253A%252F%252Fmbd.baidu.com%252Fnewspage%252Fdata%252Flandingpage%253Fs_type%253Dnews%2526dsp%253Dwise%2526context%253D%25257B%252522nid%252522%25253A%252522news_10270811094622117840%252522%25257D%2526pageType%253D1%2526n_type%253D1%2526p_from%253D-1%2526innerIframe%253D1%2522%252C%2522isThird%2522%253Afalse%252C%2522title%2522%253Anull%257D%257D)
这里面的数据说中国城镇居民家庭总资产平均值317.9万元，住房拥有率达到96.0%。
